original_text: Now, since the Amalekites and the Canaanites dwell in the valleys, turn tomorrow and set out for the wilderness by the way to the Red Sea.”
korean_text: 아말렉인과 가나안인이 골짜기에 거주하나니 너희는 내일 돌이켜 홍해 길을 따라 광야로 들어갈지니라

sentences.original_text: since the Amalekites and the Canaanites dwell in the valleys,
sentences.korean_translation: 아말렉 사람과 가나안 사람이 골짜기에 살고 있으므로,

sentences.original_text: and set out for the wilderness
by the way to the Red Sea.”
